author: fielding
msg: Clear up some confusion about top_builddir.

author: fielding
msg: I forgot that people might pick up an old aclocal.m4 by mistake,
which would cause useless build errors.  Remove it for a while.

author: fielding
msg: Move the build tool check into APR and improve the comments.
This is in preparation of APR being the center of all builds.

author: fielding
msg: This shell script checks the builder's setup for the right versions
of the build tools (autoconf and libtool) needed to build APR on unix.

author: fielding
msg: Remove the need for aclocal.m4 by copying libtool.m4 into build and
directly including the macro files into configure.in.
